lead_paragraph: Brazil started its quest for an Olympic gold medal in men's soccer with a disappointing 0-0 draw against South Africa, a result that prompted loud jeers by some of the home fans.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Held to 0-0 Draw by South Africa in Men's Soccer
headline.main: Brazil Held to 0-0 Draw by South Africa in Men's Soccer
